public HashMap<String, String> getROApiResponse(String ro_number) {
		//https://zschn01vm0005.zucisystems.com:3001/api/order/RO000000001
		//extract().asString();
		RestAssured.baseURI = "https://zschn01vm0005.zucisystems.com:3001/";
		
		Response response =  given().relaxedHTTPSValidation().log().all()
				.cookie("token", getToken())
				.when().get("api/order/"+ro_number);
		//JsonPath jj = new JsonPath(ROResponse);
		//System.out.println(jj.getString("data[0].customerName"));
		//System.out.println(jj.getString("data[0].returnPackages[0].productName"));
		
		Response response = validateROApiResponse(ro_number);
		//put values to hashmap
		apiHashMap.put("orderId", response.jsonPath().getString("data.orderId"));
		apiHashMap.put("customerName", response.jsonPath().getString("data.customerName"));
		apiHashMap.put("customerContactNumber", response.jsonPath().getString("data.customerContactNumber"));
		apiHashMap.put("productName", response.jsonPath().getString("data.returnPackages.productName"));
		apiHashMap.put("productCategory", response.jsonPath().getString("data.returnPackages.productCategory.category"));
		System.out.println(apiHashMap);
		//return ODResponce;
		return apiHashMap;
	}
